verses.verse: Then Jacob<WH3290> went on<WH5375> his journey,<WH7272> and came<WH3212> to the land<WH776> of the children<WH1121> of the east.<WH6924>

He looked,<WH7200> and behold,<WH875> a well in the field,<WH7704> and,<WH7969> behold, three flocks<WH5739> of sheep<WH6629> lying<WH7257> there by it.<WH875> For out of that well they watered<WH8248> the flocks.<WH5739> The stone<WH68> on the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310> was large.<WH1419>

There all the flocks<WH5739> were gathered.<WH622> They rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth,<WH6310> and watered<WH8248> the sheep,<WH6629> and put<WH7725> the stone<WH68> again<WH7725> on the well<WH875>'s mouth<WH6310> in its place.<WH4725>
Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to them,<WH251> "My relatives, where<WH370> are you from?<WH559>" They said, "We are from Haran.<WH2771>"
He said<WH559> to them,<WH3045> "Do you know Laban,<WH3837> the son<WH1121> of Nahor?<WH5152>" They said,<WH559> "We know him.<WH3045>"
He said<WH559> to them,<WH7965> "Is it well with him?<WH559>" They said, "It is well.<WH7965> See,<WH7354> Rachel, his daughter,<WH1323> is coming<WH935> with the sheep.<WH6629>"

He said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH2005> it is still the middle<WH1419> of the day,<WH3117> not time<WH6256> to gather the livestock<WH4735> together.<WH622> Water<WH8248> the sheep,<WH6629> and go<WH3212> and feed them.<WH7462>"

They said,<WH559> "We can<WH3201>'t, until all the flocks<WH5739> are gathered together,<WH622> and they roll<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth.<WH6310> Then we water<WH8248> the sheep.<WH6629>"
While he was yet<WH5750> speaking<WH1696> with them,<WH7354> Rachel came<WH935> with her father<WH1>'s sheep,<WH6629> for she kept them.<WH7462>

It happened,<WH3290> when Jacob saw<WH7200> Rachel<WH7354> the daughter<WH1323> of Laban,<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother,<WH251> and the sheep<WH6629> of Laban,<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother,<WH251> that Jacob<WH3290> went near,<WH5066> and rolled<WH1556> the stone<WH68> from the well<WH875>'s mouth,<WH6310> and watered<WH8248> the flock<WH6629> of Laban<WH3837> his mother<WH517>'s brother.<WH251>
Jacob<WH3290> kissed<WH5401> Rachel,<WH7354> and lifted up<WH5375> his voice,<WH6963> and wept.<WH1058>
Jacob<WH3290> told<WH5046> Rachel<WH7354> that he was her father<WH1>'s brother,<WH251> and that he was Rebekah<WH7259>'s son.<WH1121> She ran<WH7323> and told<WH5046> her father.<WH1>

It happened,<WH3837> when Laban heard<WH8085> the news of Jacob,<WH3290> his sister<WH269>'s son,<WH1121> that he ran<WH7323> to meet<WH7125> Jacob,<WH3290> and embraced<WH2263> him,<WH5401> and kissed him,<WH935> and brought him to his house.<WH1004> Jacob told<WH5608> Laban<WH3837> all these things.<WH1697>
Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> to him,<WH389> "Surely you are my bone<WH6106> and my flesh.<WH1320>" He lived<WH3427> with him for<WH3117> a month.<WH2320>
Laban<WH3837> said<WH559> to Jacob,<WH3290> "Because you are my brother,<WH251> should you therefore serve<WH5647> me for nothing?<WH2600> Tell<WH5046> me,<WH4909> what will your wages be?"
Laban<WH3837> had two<WH8147> daughters.<WH1323> The name<WH8034> of the elder<WH1419> was Leah,<WH3812> and the name<WH8034> of the younger<WH6996> was Rachel.<WH7354>
Leah<WH3812>'s eyes<WH5869> were weak,<WH7390> but Rachel<WH7354> was beautiful<WH3303> in form<WH3303> and attractive.<WH4758>
Jacob<WH3290> loved<WH157> Rachel.<WH7354> He said,<WH559> "I will serve<WH5647> you seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel,<WH7354> your younger<WH6996> daughter.<WH1323>"
Laban<WH3837> said,<WH559> "It is better<WH2896> that I give<WH5414> her to you,<WH5414> than that I should give her to another<WH312> man.<WH376> Stay with me.<WH3427>"
Jacob<WH3290> served<WH5647> seven<WH7651> years<WH8141> for Rachel.<WH7354> They seemed<WH5869> to him but a few<WH259> days,<WH3117> for the love he had for her.<WH160>
Jacob<WH3290> said<WH559> to Laban,<WH3837> "Give<WH3051> me my wife,<WH802> for my days<WH3117> are fulfilled,<WH4390> that I may go in to her.<WH935>"
Laban<WH3837> gathered together<WH622> all the men<WH582> of the place,<WH4725> and made<WH6213> a feast.<WH4960>
It happened in the evening,<WH6153> that he took<WH3947> Leah<WH3812> his daughter,<WH1323> and brought<WH935> her to him.<WH935> He went in to her.
Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> Zilpah<WH2153> his handmaid<WH8198> to his daughter<WH1323> Leah<WH3812> for a handmaid.<WH8198>

It happened in the morning<WH1242> that,<WH3812> behold, it was Leah. He said<WH559> to Laban,<WH3837> "What is this you have done<WH6213> to me?<WH5647> Didn't I serve with you for Rachel?<WH7354> Why then have you deceived me?<WH7411>"
Laban<WH3837> said,<WH559> "It is not done<WH6213> so in our place,<WH4725> to give<WH5414> the younger<WH6810> before<WH6440> the firstborn.<WH1067>

Fulfill<WH4390> the week<WH7620> of this one,<WH2063> and we will give<WH5414> you the other also for the service<WH5656> which you will serve<WH5647> with me yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years.<WH8141>"
Jacob<WH3290> did<WH6213> so,<WH4390> and fulfilled her week.<WH7620> He gave<WH5414> him Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> as wife.<WH802>
Laban<WH3837> gave<WH5414> to Rachel<WH7354> his daughter<WH1323> Bilhah,<WH1090> his handmaid,<WH8198> to be her handmaid.<WH8198>
He went in<WH935> also to Rachel,<WH7354> and he loved<WH157> also Rachel<WH7354> more than Leah,<WH3812> and served<WH5647> with him yet seven<WH7651> other<WH312> years.<WH8141>
Yahweh<WH3068> saw<WH7200> that Leah<WH3812> was hated,<WH8130> and he opened<WH6605> her womb,<WH7358> but Rachel<WH7354> was barren.<WH6135>

Leah<WH3812> conceived,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son,<WH1121> and she named<WH8034> him<WH7121> Reuben.<WH7205> For<WH3588> she said,<WH559> "Because<WH3588> Yahweh<WH3068> has looked<WH7200> at my affliction.<WH6040> For<WH3588> now my husband<WH376> will love me.<WH157>"

She conceived<WH2029> again,<WH3205> and bore a son,<WH1121> and said,<WH559> "Because Yahweh<WH3068> has heard<WH8085> that I am hated,<WH8130> he has therefore given<WH5414> me this son also.<WH8034>" She named him<WH7121> Simeon.<WH8095>

She conceived again,<WH2029> and bore<WH3205> a son.<WH1121> Said,<WH559> "Now this time<WH6471> will my husband<WH376> be joined<WH3867> to me,<WH3205> because I have borne him three<WH7969> sons.<WH1121>" Therefore was his name<WH8034> called<WH7121> Levi.<WH3878>

She conceived<WH2029> again,<WH3205> and bore a son.<WH1121> She said,<WH559> "This<WH6471> time will I praise<WH3034> Yahweh.<WH3068>" Therefore she named<WH8034> him<WH7121> Judah.<WH3063> Then she stopped<WH5975> bearing.<WH3205>
